actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation, H. Rept. 95-1100.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that the park referred to as the East Lake Park located within the West Point Lake project on the Chattahoochee River, Georgia, shall hereafter be known and designated as the "R. Shaefer Heard Park".

summary.text: Renames East Lake Park, located within the West Point Lake Project on the Chattahoochee River, Georgia, the "R. Shaefer Heard Park".

titles.title: A bill to provide that the park referred to as the East Lake Park located within the West Point Lake project on the Chattahoochee River, Georgia, shall hereafter be known and designated as the "R. Shaefer Heard Park".
